page.title: 11The Community Of St. Illtyd.
page.content: {St. Illtyd My Local Community written {by Craig Davies. My community St. Illtyd's, is a very small hamlet.There are only 25 people there,living in 6 houses.There is 1 public house and a caravan.There is also a very old church,built over 700 years ago but closed down for safety reasons in 1968.The church,St.Illtyds has been in a state of disrepair since and a fund to restore the church was set up by Mr & Mrs Hale.Most houses in this area are over 200 years old. I live in an old welsh long house,and over the road is an old welsh cottage, ,Castle Cottage,next to this is a smaller cottage,and next to that is the local pub.,The Carpenters Arm's, which was owned by Mr D.Jones but is now owned by Mr&Mrs Joseph Hale from London.Opposite the pub. is a unique modern bungalow,Crad-y-Awel.
